title: San Francisco Murals
description: The image shows a large mural painted on the side of a brick building. The mural depicts an industrial scene with smokestacks and abstract figures, incorporating vivid colors like red and gray. Below the mural, five vehicles, including a blue van and various cars of the era, are parked in a row. The scene is well-lit, suggesting clear weather conditions. The 35mm slide was dated May 16, 1977. Location is near 26th and Folsom St in San Francisco.
